title: Devastator

***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

|   |                                                   |
| - | ------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A wooden cudgel, loaded with more than just lead. |

[![Devastator.png](/images/d/da/Devastator.png)](/File:Devastator.png) ***the +6 shillelagh "Devastator"***

+6 shillelagh (modified [club](/Club "Club"); 8 base damage)  
Causes a 3x3 explosion when damage is dealt[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)

## Contents

- [1 Mechanics](#Mechanics)
- [2 Desirability](#Desirability)
- [3 History](#History)
- [4 References](#References)

## Mechanics

The explosion deals `Nd(5 + weapon_dmg/2)` additional damage to the target and all monsters adjacent to it.[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)[\[3\]](#cite_note-3) It cannot miss. It does not affect [invisible](/Invisible "Invisible") monsters if you can't [see invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible"), nor does it affect the player.

Like [Shatter](/Shatter "Shatter"), the number of dice 'N' is dependent on the monster hurt:

| Target                                                                                |  N |
| :------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -: |
| Monsters made from metal, stone or crystal                                            |  6 |
| [Insubstantial](/Insubstantial "Insubstantial") monsters                              |  1 |
| [Petrifying](/Petrify "Petrify")/Petrified (reduced later by petrification reduction) |  6 |
| Monsters made from ice or bone                                                        |  6 |
| Slimy monsters                                                                        |  1 |
| [Flying](/Flying "Flying") monsters                                                   |  1 |
| All other monsters                                                                    |  3 |

Note that N is calculated for each individual monster, so targeting a metallic monster won't make the explosion cause more damage to flying monsters nearby.

Against a regular non-flying monster, you can expect an average of `7.5 + (75% * wpn_dmg)` explosion damage, but unlike [brands](/Brand "Brand"), it is affected by [AC](/AC "AC").

## Desirability

**Devastator**[\[4\]](#cite_note-4) is basically a well-enchanted [club](/Club "Club") with a "brand" that deals extra splash damage. It's especially useful against swarms of fragile enemies, like [killer bees](/Killer_bee "Killer bee"), but it's still great against lone enemies in the early- and mid-game. Later on, you'll want to switch to an [eveningstar](/Eveningstar "Eveningstar") or [demon whip](/Demon_whip "Demon whip") - these deal more damage against single targets.

This artefact is more likely to spawn in the early game, where it is more likely to be useful.

## History

- In [0.29](/0.29 "0.29"), Devastator creates [noise](/Noise "Noise") again, though is much quieter.
- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), Devastator was not explicitly likely to spawn in the early-game.
- Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), Devastator's explosions were very loud instead of being completely silent.
- Prior to [0.15](/0.15 "0.15"), Devastator had a +4, +8 enchantment level.
- Devastator was added in [0.10](/0.10 "0.10").

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [spl-damage.cc:1701](https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/0.31.0/crawl-ref/source/spl-damage.cc#L1701) (0.31.0)
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [art-func.h:751](https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/0.30.1/crawl-ref/source/art-func.h#L751) (0.30.1)
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [spl-damage.cc:1747](https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/0.31.0/crawl-ref/source/spl-damage.cc#L1747) (0.31.0)
